Detailed Description

An animation that controls the alpha level of an object.

Useful for fading things in and out. This animation ends up changing the alpha property of a Transformation

 Animation *anim = new AlphaAnimation(0.1f,0.9f);
 AccelerateInterpolator *ip = new AccelerateInterpolator();

 anim->setStartOffset(500);
 anim->setDuration(1500);
 anim->setRepeatCount(0);
 anim->setInterpolator(ip);

 ImageWidget *ImWidg = new ImageWidget(this);
 ImWidg->startAnimation(anim);

 delete anim;
 delete ip;

Constructor to use when building an AlphaAnimation from code.

fromAlphaStarting alpha value for the animation, where 1.0 means fully opaque and 0.0 means fully transparent.
